document_data.name: Shetai
document_data.mainbody: '''Shetai''', the '''Vulgar Inquisitor''', was a high-ranking [[paeliryon]] that was a [[fiend patron]] for [[warlock]]s in the 14{{th}} and 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1352}}, Shetai, still an [[erinyes]] in the service of [[Malagard]], was summoned by [[Bryseis Kakistos]] and forged a [[Warlock|warlock pact]] with her.

Shetai was responsible for the fall of the Hag Countess and afterward gained much power. By [[1353 DR]], Shetai had become a paeliryon and explained to Bryseis that [[Asmodeus]] himself was interested in renewing her pact.

In the 14{{th}} century, it was collecting warlocks and double-crossed [[Lorcan]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Shetai had some trouble and so asked Lorcan for help, using his sister [[Neferis]] as a messenger.
document_data.Relationship: Shetai had some dealings with Lorcan. The Vulgar Inquisitor was the patron of a warlock heir of the [[Toril thirteen]] called [[Lachs|Lachs the Yellow]]. Shetai commanded some of its fellow erinyes.
